channel.title: I really need help!
channel.description: (client side) Can someone guide me step by step getting an ip, downloading a client, configuring it, and playing my server on it. im an advanced coder. i can follow simple directions. the only reason i ask of this. i used 100 tutorials on help... when i configure my client, it doesnt connect to my server no matter what. thanks for helping!

item.title: I really need help!
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

[quote=“MasterHelper, post:3, topic:177741”][quote author=Reforced link=topic=238665.msg2027043#msg2027043 date=1201936052]

(client side) Can someone guide me step by step getting an ip, downloading a client, configuring it, and playing my server on it. im an advanced coder. i can follow simple directions. the only reason i ask of this. i used 100 tutorials on help… when i configure my client, it doesnt connect to my server no matter what. thanks for helping!

An advanced coder who spammed the download section with ‘JOIN DRAGONGUILD NOW !!!111!!’
[/quote]

myob. stfu. that was my partner. hes gay his name was dragonguild. go somewhere noob.[/quote]

Wow I’m really enjoying your feirce comebacks.

Read full topic
